item.title: Gum continues to be a profitable product in Indonesia
item.description:
Indonesia experienced growth in the gum confectionery market in 2016, primarily driven by better distribution channels for gum products, particularly chewing gum, facilitated by the expansion of modern retail stores. Market research firm Euromonitor notes that consumers are increasingly drawn to the advantages of gum, such as breath freshening and teeth whitening properties. Euromonitor reports that PT Perfetti Van Melle Indonesia maintained its dominance in the gum market, holding a 58% value share in 2016...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gum-continues-to-be-a-profitable-product-in-indonesia/
